Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Serpentor/Koga Shuko:



Both of the Newcomers chuckled, seeing a few of the Maximals fall.


Anubis raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Key.

---

Hades fired a rocket off at Blue Stinger.

---

Unitron came out of the bushes, followed by Serpentor.  "Shuko is a fool!" 
Serpentor yelled, raising his plasma launcher and firing a powerful blast off 
at Sona.

---

Unitron raised both rifles, firing five shots each.  Five at Liono, five at 
Tigerhawk, simultaneously firing two optic blasts at Antagony.

---

Koga Shuko, hearing Killer's com transmission, swerved, heading back towards 
the battle.  <All forces, come back to the battle!  WE WILL SLAUGHTER THE 
MAXIMALS, ONE BY ONE, UNTIL THEY CRACK!>
